title: Ruth Farmer. A story
author: Marchbank, Agnes.
snippet: shaking his head, and there was a fear in her heartthat maybe John was in love, and was wearied of hisquiet life among the hills of Dalwhat.

title: Ruth Farmer. A story
author: Marchbank, Agnes.
snippet: Of course the old manhad very peculiar ideas about many things, and,in spite of his little dandy ways, was utterlyunworldly, as might be expected of a man who hadlived for many years in the dark glen of Dalwhat,

title: Ruth Farmer. A story
author: Marchbank, Agnes.
snippet: Captain Stewart had called the little croft hebought in Dalwhat Glen—Palace Knowe.
